channel.title: Black Mesa is a lot less illuminated in the mod, wouldn't you agree?
channel.description:
There are a lot more shadows and a lot less general illumination in the mod's rendition of Black Mesa.
I was watching the media when I realized it. There's black everywhere, in contrast to the original Black Mesa.
Was this made in order to make the game scarier? Maybe it was for realism..?

item.description:
ErikKiller:

Am I doing this right?

You know what? I guess it would be pretty safe if Ram and Kester and co. gave the development of this mod to us.

  1. Who is this ‘Kester’?
  2. How about no. Like the majority of people on the internet, you probably don’t even know what a bsp is, let alone how to make one.
    EDIT: Oh, that pic hadn’t loaded when I typed this.
    haha, sorry, didn’t realize you were joking because of that.
